knimeNode.name: Similar fragments
knimeNode.shortDescription: Find similar fragments to queries based on the Kripo fingerprint similarity matrix.

intro.p: KRIPO stands for Key Representation of Interaction in POckets .
Find similar fragments bound to similar subpockets as the subpocket associated with the query fragment based on the fingerprint similarity matrix.
When combining this node with other Kripo nodes make sure the files are from the same dataset.

fullDescription.option: The column containing the Kripo fragment identifiers
Cutoff, scores below cutoff are discarded.
Maximum number of hits for each query.

tab.name: Advanced Options
tab.option: Url to use as base path for Kripo webservice
Timeout in seconds to wait for Kripo webservice response

ports.outPort: Table with similar Kripo identifiers and scores vs the input table.
